item.description:
Get to know who your fellow meetup members are. Not just socially, but professionally.

This is an event like none other we have ever done. It’s going to be a blast!

It's for all members. Whether you have your own business, work for an organization or in job transition, this just may be a very powerful night for you.

There will be door prizes, opportunities for you to talk about yourself in front of everyone, and even display tables. Fun activities will be planned to make it easy to mingle and get the most out of your networking experience.

The event is free and open to the first 50 people to RSVP.
Exhibitors may come between 5 and 5:30 to set up. Networking Party is from 6 pm to 8 pm.

If you are interested in displaying your materials or products, send a separate email to Jackierg@comcast.net . Space is limited to the first 20 people. The cost of having display space is a door prize for the drawing. That’s it!
item.name: Networking Party
